wiki.content:
Originally conceived of while writing their first album under the tentative title "The Five of Us Are Dying", the song was finally finished for inclusion as the central song in the album "The Black Parade".
 The music video for this song utilizes imagery reminiscent of a grimly interpreted "Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band." This song was the first single to showcase MCR's more theatrical approach to recording, with many tracks used in recording and Gerard's movement in the video being quite similar to Freddie Mercury's bravado in Queen's grandiose stage performances.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary:
Originally conceived of while writing their first album under the tentative title "The Five of Us Are Dying", the song was finally finished for inclusion as the central song in the album "The Black Parade".
 The music video for this song utilizes imagery reminiscent of a grimly interpreted "Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band." This song was the first single to showcase MCR's more theatrical approach to recording, with many tracks used in recording and Gerard's movement in the video being quite similar to Freddie Mercury's bravado in Queen's grandiose stage performances.

track.name: Welcome to the Black Parade
comments: It's a shame these guys have the label of emo teen band , this is one of the best written songs of the past decade , don't get the credit they deserve IMO. [17]
it makes me cry because reminds me of my grandma who recently passed away :/
They were together for 12 years... 12 YEARS! It's sad they broke up
One of the best written emo teen songs of the past decade*
This song is in top 3 songs in my life.
It's a shame these guys have the label of emo teen band , this is one of the best written songs of the past decade , don't get the credit they deserve IMO. [16]
Favorite song by them next to Helena.
Love this song! ♥ It's a shame they split :(
Welcome to the Black Parade gives me goosbumps.
Para sempre uma parte importante e significativa de minha vida....
never gets old ♥ [2] I really never get sick of this song. It's fantastic.
